column2: fit2 = tsglm(t_Cal, model = list(past_obs = c(1,2, 12), past_mean = c(1,2, 12)), link = "log",
f_2 = predict(fit2, n.ahead=18, level=0.95, type="quantiles", global = TRUE)
xlab("Year") + ylab("Drug Overdose Deaths") + ggtitle("Drug Overdose Model Predictions") + theme_bw()+theme(legend.title = element_blank(),legend.position = "bottom")
